targets.query:
from(bucket: "SharedAirDFW")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "GPSGPGGA2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "latitudeCoordinate" or r["_field"] == "longitudeCoordinate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_name"] == "Central Hub 2")
  |> last()
